author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.3.0` -- Gamlum -- released!

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0

This is the CL spec release for the Capella upgrade that went live on mainnet last week.

Note, this also includes the Deneb change of blob tx type to 0x03 and the test vectors reflect this.
